description.short: Worked on many data science projects utilising supervised and un-supervised machine learning methods. Some projects undertaken included time series forecasting of order and revenue numbers with Facebook Prophet, clustering survey and website visitor data for website personalisation.

bartender.short: I bartended sooooo much. I am super cool.Maybe you should hire me.... ;)
